Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: i am extremely disappointed with Rouge project after having bought into their ICO. Their telegram channel is full of spam bots and they have no idea how to market their product. If they want to be a leader in the coupon space they must market themselves aggressively. Also, for the investor its bad because the tokens are hardly on any exchanges. This makes it hard for investors to sell their tokens. i hope they wake up because i want this project to succeed as it has alot of potential.

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: Hi everyone,  We have released a major update of our CouponDemo ÐApp  :              http://demo.rouge.network/  You can now use MetaMask! Of course only Ropsten network (i.e. test network) is selection-able. You don't want to use real Ether with a demo app .     You can still use a local Ethererum via RPC ( http://localhost:8545 ) if you prefer.  Let us know if you have question. All feedback welcome as always.  V.

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: Hi everyone,  I'm please to say that this is the time for our first public token event :  Next pre-sale token event: RGX20 on 31 Aug 2017 5pm UTC  local times => Pacific time: 10 AM (31 Aug) *** Eastern time: 1 PM (31 Aug) *** Europe/Paris time: 7pm (31 Aug) *** Hong Kong time: 1 AM (+1 day! 01 Sep)  RGX20 are special tokens that give you a 20x bonus (twenty times, i.e. 95% discount) for our future RGE ICO below.  Token symbol: RGX20 Total distribution: 28,908 tokens max only! (hard cap) Event duration: 24 hours only! Price per token: 0.001 ether (1 finney) Token type: open source ERC20 compliant Ethereum contract Source code: github  Please check the token page on our website for instructions.To avoid any phishing attempt on the contract address, you can verify the address with our proof of address as explained in our medium article.  Cheers,

See token distribution on Etherscan :  https://etherscan.io/token/0xc91c786929e86189ce1b4ab5a4ed9d892b8303d9?a=0x718f33d3314f72214035dc3fc79c50cc2c0c5e24  Let me know if you have other question. Author: Rengganis
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: I think the team's information is very needed by a professional project, not important it is a small team or big, we want to know the full team profile to make sure the project is seriously done or just a scam. It will help build the trust of many people

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: I understand and we will give more information about us as we go forward. Actually you have already the team profiles as our social media accounts as I said. But make no mistake, we are not famous figure of the community (yet ) or stars in the startup scene. We are real people who are working very hard to build up a project from the ground. I hate scams as everyone of you and a being in bitcoin since 2011, you can imagine I have seen many!  In the question of proof, I should warn you to trust too much nice photos and clean linkedin profiles (i hate linkedin myself). I don't want to be the one throwing stones around but you have seen even recently glossy team on websites and bitcointalk that look perfect on paper but that reveal later to be nothing more than smoke and mirror constructions.  As a veteran of free software, i think trust can be build more on "show me the code" principles than photos. So this is why, you guys are going to see the code of our platform as we grow the project. There is a small beginning here and I will finishing the workflow of the first dapp coupon that i will push in the next days.  Outside of trust on the code itself, we plan to give interviews and participate in conferences around the world to show up the platform and us so you will have many occasions to see and interact better with Naira and me before the RGE crowd sale.  V.

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: The Rouge Project  Voucher and Note Protocol   The Rouge Project is an open-source software project building a voucher and note protocol — the Rouge Network — as a suite of smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.  Rouge vouchers are the future of ecommerce and digital marketing: trackable, verifiable, monitizeable, secure and frictionless. The Rouge platform will foster an ecosystem of decentralized applications (ÐApps) opening new possibilities for digital vouchers.  Read the white paper  Watch our videos  Check and experiment with our The Coupon Demo ÐApp  the future of digital vouchers is on the blockchain   Contact  Website: rouge.network  Join us on telegram  Blog: medium.com/the-rouge-project  Newsletter: sign up and be first to get updates!  Follow us on twitter: @Rougetoken / @NdArcollieres  Join us on facebook: facebook.com/rougetoken  email: hello@rouge.network

Author: Andeze17
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: I agree the OP could look a lot nicer and provide a lot more information, but the whitepaper looks promising.

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: We have not yet finalized the ICO plan since we are studying different scenarios. 1 Billion tokens is probably going to be issued total. fixed supply. never more.  Actually there are some ways in the whitepaper when some tokens get burned (not redeemed coupons). So the appcoin is by that definition deflationary.  Yes, there may a pool reserved for the development team (so premine) but I'm not in favor myself of that.  The final plan concerning ICO should be announced in August  with token events from Q4 2017.  Pre-ICO fundings events are going to take place before. I will inform on bitcointalk soon about this.  We don't want to rush things because we are creating a long term and sustainable project. Our goal is to become a profitable ecosystem for all actors (actors in the Digital Coupon ecosystem, but also appcoin owners). So the project needs to be viable, not only the ICO per se (ICO are a means IMHO, not an end).  About the white paper, we have now gathered many feedbacks and we will a new version next week (and maybe as soon as this weekend).  You can also follow Naira on twitter https://twitter.com/NdArcollieres on twitter who is the founder of this project. You may also want to subscribe to our mailing list : https://rouge.network/#subscribe  Thanks, V.

Author: cryptodv
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: 1 Billion?? Anything over 500 million tokens should have some type of airdrop involved IMHO, just to get things circulating.

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: I understand somewhat your concern but I don't think there will be any "airdrop".  We prefer that the velocity of the appcoin circulation comes from intrinsic values it carries for the ecosystem, not by artificial means (you have a list of reasons why the appcoin is both necessary and useful for the ecosystem page 7/8 of the white paper).  Last, I also understand that is fair to reward in some way the community. I will come back this week end with the mechanics for that (we are working on that now so it not finalized).

Author: Oliver2
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: Hi everyone,  Sorry if this feels a bit quiet but we have been busy working backstage.  In particular I can already announce that special crowd funding tokens are going to go to sell in the next days and weeks.  These tokens are NOT RGE tokens - the main Dapp-token describe in our white paper (the RGE token are the fuel of the rouge platform ecosystem).  These new tokens - discount vouchers - are going to be named RGXn (where n is a number) and RGXB for the bounty tokens. They are ERC20 compliant Ethereum contract also, but with a fixed price of 1 finney (0.001 ether), and will be issued in a very limited numbers. They are meant for those who want to help us build this project at this very early stage.  They will give various discount for the future RGE crowd sale after October. To sum up, every ether invested in RGXn will give the right to get n times the current price when you will buy RGE (for example with 2.5 ether of RGX9, in case you want to buy 2.5 ether of RGE, you will receive automatically a bonus of 2.5 x 9 times = 22.5 ether of RGE).  I'll publish the contract type tomorrow as open source so everyone can audit it.  All questions and feedback welcome as usual.  V.  nb: we will open a bounty thread soon after this RGX is audited.

Author: Valentin
Title: [ANN] The Rouge Project - Voucher and Note Protocol - Ethereum
Body: We have just committed the RGX contract solidity code we will use.  See https://github.com/TheRougeProject/RougeTokens  Comments welcome. We will update very soon how they are going to be used.
